items.name: Rearguard
implicitMods: Adds 9 to 15 Physical Damage to Attacks
explicitMods: 24% Chance to Block Attack Damage
15% Chance to Block Spell Damage
+433 to Armour
30% increased Projectile Speed
50% increased Stun and Block Recovery
19% increased Projectile Damage
flavourText: "It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

items.name: Dying Sun
enchantMods: Used when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy, if not already in effect
explicitMods: 135% increased Charges per use
40% less Duration
20% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
20% increased Curse Duration
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 30% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 19% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Widowhail
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Area of Effect per 4% Quality
explicitMods: 244% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills, and any other skills that chain.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: 10% increased effect of Aura
You and nearby Allies have 25% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 40% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
